programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell loytaa rakennelman, jonka han uskoo olevan isojalan pesa. Tiimin uusi jasen Ronny liittyy Mireyan seuraan kilpajuoksuun pesalle ehtimisesta DNA-naytteiden keraamiseksi.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Kurkistamme hain kitaan kameroiden kuvatessa merten pelottavinta saalistajaa ulkoa ja sisalta. Naemme tarkkaan, millaista on olla hain toiminnan keskiossa`.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Kesan kunniaksi tiimi jarjestaa autonpesutempauksen, jolla kerataan varoja lehmille ja aaseille. Dan lahtee peiteoperaatioon loukkaantunutta vuohta pelastamaan.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Katherine Connor johtaa perheineen norsujen pelastuskeskusta Thaimaassa. Nainen haluaa vapauttaa kahleista vanhan Pang Fai -nimisen norsun sen loppuelamaksi.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Tutkimustulokset ja kokeet paljastavat, etta kissat pystyvat aistimaan maanjaristyksen muutamaa sekuntia etukateen. Miten merisaukko pysyy lampimana hyisissa vesissa?

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Tutkimustulokset ja kokeet selittavat, miksi norsuilla on karsa. Miksi jotkut elaimet elavat niin kauan, ja miksi kissat kehraavat?

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tutkijat saavat tiedon loukkaantunutta koirasta. Paikan paalla selviaa, etta koiran tassu on melkein irti.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 17, osa 8. Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi. (Animal Cops Houston, tosi-tv, USA, 2010)

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 17, osa 9. Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi. (Animal Cops Houston, tosi-tv, USA, 2010)

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Uuden-Meksikon kuivalla Tinajan aavikolla Bradley ja Billy jahtaavat jattimaista scolopendra-tuhatjalkaista. Myrkkykynsilla varustettu otus on vasymaton tappaja.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi matkustavat syrjaiselle paikkakunnalle pitamaan maksutonta vastaanottoa. Elainlaakari Petra pelastaa hataleikkauksella auton alle jaaneen bassetin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Vapaaehtoiset elaintensuojelijat Kansasista tuovat hoitoon pienen koiran. Elainlaakari Jeffin serkku pyytaa tiimia tuomaan Tennesseehen maksutonta palvelua.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 12. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Kouluttajat valmistavat kahta pelastettua merileijonaa silmaleikkaukseen. Älykas jattilaismustekala Ophelia tarvitsee huomiota. Tiimi matkustaa Bahamalle.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Frankie -kissa pissaa ympariinsa Danielin ja Desireesin miljoonien dollarien unelmakodissa. Lisaksi Sugar -kissa pysyttelee piilossa uuden tulokkaan Dynan tielta.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Mita jos sukupuuttoon kuolleita lajeja onkin edelleen olemassa? Villielaimiin erikoistunut biologi Forrest Galante kiertaa maapalloa etsimassa lajeja, jotka muu maailma on jo unohtanut. Tyovalineinaan hanella on huipputeknologiaa seka kaikkiin elaimiin kohdistuva syva tiedonjano. Etsinnat vievat Forrestin kaukaisiin ja joskus vaarallisiinkin paikkoihin. (Extinct Or Alive, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayde ja Brett rakantavat kaksi akvaariota hiphopin supertahti Akonin unelmataloon. Mutta tuleeko tyonteosta mitaan, kun unelmat hiphopparin elamasta vievat ajatukset mennessaan?

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: San Francisco Giants haluaa siirtaa palasen McCovey Coven satama-aluetta pelikentalle. Osaavatko pojat rakentaa akvaarion, joka on tarpeeksi iso hammastyttaakseen uskolliset fanit?

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Koripallolegenda Dwight Howard pyytaa ATM:n poikia suunnittelemaan ja rakentamaan terraarion 14:lle kaarmeelle. Han haluaa lisaksi liskolinnan!

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Carolyn Wise lahtee hirvimetsalle. Flower-jarven ryhma jahtaa oravia. Toiset ryhmat turvautuvat epatoivoisiin ruuanetsintakeinoihin.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Animal ER

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Talli ja hyvantekevaisyysjarjesto etsivat yhteisvoimin uutta kotia neljalle hylatylle vasikalle. Possupoikue syntyy. Chris rakentaa vuohille leikkikentan.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Nelja perhetta elaa eristyksessa kaukana toisistaan, ankarissa arktisissa olosuhteissa ja villin luonnon armoilla maailman viimeisiin suuriin eramaihin kuuluvassa Alaskassa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2018),

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Yksi koira rakastaa jatskia ja toinen koira jaa paastansa kiinni joka paikkaan. Myohemmin naemme papukaijan, joka rappaa ja kiroilee.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mongoliasta taimenta eli lohikalojen suurinta ja petomaisinta edustajaa. Perille paasy vaatii kuitenkin navigointia vaarallisissa olosuhteissa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Australian suurten metsapalojen jalkeen Irwinit kiirehtivat pelastamaan niin paljon elaimia kuin vain pystyvat. Robert ja Terri auttavat vahingoittuneita koalakarhuja.

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia. (The Zoo, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Talli ja hyvantekevaisyysjarjesto etsivat yhteisvoimin uutta kotia neljalle hylatylle vasikalle. Possupoikue syntyy. Chris rakentaa vuohille leikkikentan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NBA:n supertahti Anthony Davis pyytaa Waydea ja Brettia muuntamaan koko huoneen akvaarioksi!

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tassa erikoisohjelmassa lahdemme aloittelijoiden kanssa oppimaan, miten rikoksia vastaan taistellaan yhdessa USA:n vakivaltaisimmista kaupungeista.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tutkija McHugh loytaa koiran, jolta puuttuu jalka. Mita sille on tapahtunut? Tutkija AJ kauhistuu koiranpennun ollessa menehtymaisillaan punkkitartuntaan.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt yrittavat suojella yksinhuoltajaaitia ja tytarta ryskivalta hirvelta. Marty rakentaa sillan poukaman yli. Matt opettaa petojenkarkotustekniikoita.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete ja NTS rakentavat viisitasoisen "luontopaamajan" Michiganin osavaltion For-Mar -luonnonpuistoon auttaakseen vuoden 2014 vesikriisista edelleen toipuvaa yhteisoa.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tialla on edessaan kaikkien aikojen suurin hylattyjen koirien pelastusoperaatio. Paikalle saapuvat Tia, Kanani ja Earl kohtaavat pahimman elainten laiminlyontitapauksen ikina.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson kohtaa Marleyn, joka aina lahtiessaan aiheuttaa veriloylyn seka kissakaksikon, joka tuhoaa kotinsa. Katso, miten Jacksonin ihmeelliset menetelmat oikein toimivat.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt yrittavat suojella yksinhuoltajaaitia ja tytarta ryskivalta hirvelta. Marty rakentaa sillan poukaman yli. Matt opettaa petojenkarkotustekniikoita.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tulee uhri? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat jarkyttavista kokemuksistaan.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Koskettavassa sarjassa ihmiset tekevat kaikkensa, jotta pystyat auttamaan apua tarvitsevia elaimia ympari maailmaa. (Dodo Heroes, tosi-tv, USA, 2018),

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete ja NTS rakentavat viisitasoisen "luontopaamajan" Michiganin osavaltion For-Mar -luonnonpuistoon auttaakseen vuoden 2014 vesikriisista edelleen toipuvaa yhteisoa.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Antonio rakentaa vuoristomajan, joka on turvallinen sokealle koiravanhus Chickielle. Lisaksi rakennetaan japanilaistyylinen koiraolohuone.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tassa erikoisohjelmassa lahdemme aloittelijoiden kanssa oppimaan, miten rikoksia vastaan taistellaan yhdessa USA:n vakivaltaisimmista kaupungeista.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tutkija McHugh loytaa koiran, jolta puuttuu jalka. Mita sille on tapahtunut? Tutkija AJ kauhistuu koiranpennun ollessa menehtymaisillaan punkkitartuntaan.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Russell loytaa rakennelman, jonka han uskoo olevan isojalan pesa. Tiimin uusi jasen Ronny liittyy Mireyan seuraan kilpajuoksuun pesalle ehtimisesta DNA-naytteiden keraamiseksi.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: A stunning discovery in the Mediterranean reveals a lost Roman city- and the untold story of an industrial capital made rich by supplying every corner of the empire. 4/6

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A tornado touchdown terrorises a school in Texas. The violent volcanic eruption in Tonga and a tsunami leaves residents trapped with nowhere to go and pilots battle extreme cross winds.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: In the depths of winter, the off-grid Alaskans work tirelessly to combat the deep cold.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Jamie-Lee ODonnell and Saoirse-Monica Jackson, who are best friends and stars of the hit comedy Derry Girls, head way out of their comfort zone as they tackle rugged Romania. 6/8

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: In this episode about how to stay healthy on the inside, Michael meets an 86-year-old cyclist with the immune system of a 30-year-old. He also discovers the benefits of Tai Chi towards losing weight.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The guys head to the turquoise waters of The Bahamas and try to catch venomous Lionfish without being stung.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A tornado touchdown terrorises a school in Texas. The violent volcanic eruption in Tonga and a tsunami leaves residents trapped with nowhere to go and pilots battle extreme cross winds.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve heads down in a deep-sea submersible to explore the ocean depths like never before. He then travels to the Natural History Museum to meet some of the weirdest animals from the deep.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Thailand to meet Paul and Sao, who he first visited in Cambodia. Paul and his family have build their version of an English castle.

programme.title: Changing Planet
programme.desc: The second year of a definitive seven-year diary, documenting the fight to save our planets most threatened ecosystems. Six presenters meet the people fighting to restore the balance.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue wolverine-proofs her camp. Ricko hunts Moose. Jessie rescues his boat. The Hailstones prepare for winter.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: The presenter ventures deep into the Scottish Highlands to meet Iona and her young family on the near-10,000-acre wilderness estate that she grew up on. Whilst in their company, Ben drives cattle on horseback, digs out a dam to ensure the familys hydro-electricity supply and gets to grips with the annual deer cull, and hears how Ionas past prepared her for this extraordinary life in the wilderness.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Axminster factory in Devon to reveal how 46,000 square metres of carpet are produced every year. He follows the production of one of their best sellers, the Havana Diamond Steel wool carpet.

programme.title: Volcano With Dara O Briain
programme.desc: Dara begins with a mission to uncover the inner workings of volcanoes as his journey starts in Sicily, home to the mighty Mount Etna - Europes largest and most active volcano. 1/2

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: In this episode, we unravel the riddle of Tutankhamuns unusually small tomb and reveal how Tut mania, the craze of King Tut gripped the world.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Utah, 130 million years ago. A band of armoured dinosaurs battle to reach adulthood, pursued by some of the most formidable predators that have ever lived: Utahraptors.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue searches for food. Ricko teaches his children to hunt. Jessie packs down a trail for his dogs. The Hailstones go ice fishing.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: The next few weeks on Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild will see the presenter pay visits to previous contributors to the series - and tonight he travels to Norway to catch up with former Stone Age host Lynx, who now lives in the Norwegian wilderness.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: All Romesh knows about Colombia is cocaine barons and for most of his life, that was more than enough to stop him wanting to visit. But is Colombias reputation for drug wars justified? 4/5

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits an enormous factory in York to learn how millions of peppermint-flavoured bubbly chocolate bars are produced every year.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As the cold season wanes in the Arctic, winter does not go quietly into the night.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Darren Harriott is a former bouncer and self-confessed city boy, while Ria Lina is full of adventurous spirit with a PhD and autism. How will they fare travelling in South Africa? 7/8

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Michael looks at advances at the frontier of medicine that are attempting to turn back the clock on ageing. He starts in Tel Aviv, where he tries some Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The trio head to Thailand, where they join an ancient nomadic tribe called the Sea Gypsies who help them catch a dangerous giant moray eel - by freediving with just a spear.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: An in-depth analysis of a massive volcanic eruption in 44 BC may have hastened the end of the ancient Egyptian empire.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Hurricane Ida unleashes terror in New York City, a lakeside resort turns into a ball of flames and wolves surround a snowbound tent in the Canadian Arctic.

programme.title: Deadly 60

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: A trip through the Peak District at full steam, pulled by the Royal Scot, one of the finest locomotives ever built. On the way from Crewe to York, the train travels over Chat Moss on a line built by Robert Stephenson.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures deep into the Appalachian Mountains in eastern America to meet 25-year-old Justin Burke, who rejected his privileged upbringing to live in the wilderness.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: For Alaskans, the return of winter brings new and dangerous challenges.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness and Cherry Healey visit a factory producing half a million sausage rolls a day. 5/6

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: David Attenborough showcases wildlife in coastal regions, from Cape fur seals on n South Africas Robberg Peninsula to hungry lions on Namibias infamous Skeleton Coast. Plus, a look at how the Arctic coast is the scene of the biggest seasonal transformation on Earth, as the melting of billions of tonnes of ice brings short-lived opportunities to coastal waters

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A once in a generation eruption on a volcanic island. In the United States, heavy rain and snow melt submerge a town and in Italy, giant hail pulls up pavements, and traps drivers in their cars.

programme.title: Food: Delicious Science
programme.desc: James reveals the surprising link between chocolate and breast milk, a remarkable team studies the effect of caffeine on bees and Michael finds out what hot chillies do to our brains.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: From Douro to Sintra. Join us on a journey through some very British parts of Portugal. We start at the Douro railway and a winery that produces port wine before exploring how the royal families of England and Portugal became connected. Aveiro offers salted cod before the journey continues on a CP300 locomotive to Lisbon and a classic cream tart. Sintras magical palaces are the final destination of this episode.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As winters grip in the Arctic strengthens, Alaskans are forced to react to avoid an icy demise.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben builds hammocks, goes freediving and experiences rough seas when he meets British expat Rick and his girlfriend Jasna, who live a nomadic life on their yacht in the islands of French Polynesia.

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: The wildlife inhabiting the worlds oceans, from the shallow seas of the tropics, where predators like the lionfish can become the prey to one of the worlds oddest hunters, to the greatest depths, where a massive siphonophore, longer than a blue whale, and a gulper eel with huge jaws are captured on film using specialised vessels designed to withstand the pressure. The episode also features the mating dances of mobula rays and the symbiotic relationship between Columbus crabs and turtles

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness and Cherry Healey visit a factory that produces three million books every week and makes 20,000 hardback copies of Pride and Prejudice. 6/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With temperatures on the rise, Alaskans must ensure their survival in the hostile Arctic.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.title: Heikoin lenkki
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan juontaa yleistietokilpailua, jossa kahdeksan kuuluisaa henkiloa kilpailee 50 000 punnan palkinnosta valitsemaansa hyvatekevaisyyskohteeseen.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade ja Greg Davies yrittavat uuttaa Moskovan olemuksen vain 48 tunnissa. Se on haaste, jossa heidat nahdaan ottavan yhteen panssarivaunujen kanssa Punaisella torilla, matkaavan avaruuteen ja maan alle seka vierailemaan yhdessa maailman oudoimmista sirkuksista. Lyhytaikaisina matkaajina Richardin ja Gregin ensimmainen kohde Venajan paakaupungissa on Punainen tori, ja sita seuraava pysakki on kosmonauttimuseo, jossa parivaljakko kokeilee aitoa avaruusruokaa, jonka maku ja tekstuuri haastaa heita jonkin verran. He arvioivat uudelleen soveltuvuuttaan astronauteiksi ja jatkavat lomaansa kahden yritteliaan nuoren moskovalaisen organisoimalla kavelykierroksella Moskovan esikaupungissa. Kierros paattyy heidan asuntoonsa, jossa on vodkaa ja suolakurkkuja, mika jattaa Gregille lampiman ja Richardille horjuvan tunteen. Autenttisemman kokemuksen etsinnassa kaksikko menee saunaan kaupungin kuuluisassa Sandunyn kylpylassa ja lopuksi suuntaa Pietari Suuren epatavalliselle patsaalle kokoamaan ajatuksiaan kokemuksistaan tassa eeppisessa kaupungissa.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade matkustaa kahdeksi vuorokaudeksi Sevillaan koomikko Rob Delaneyn kanssa. Euroopan aurinkoisimmassa kaupungissa opitaan flamencoa, syodaan tapaksia ja kaydaan Villissa Lannessa. Tulos on nopea, hauska ja informatiivinen.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzy’s liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings’ ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robot’s artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings’ hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabin’s interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzy’s cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzy’s discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he can’t watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings aren’t interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends "favourite play tree" the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Cheps new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesnt know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders enter a sandcastle building contest, Tweety sees the competition and loses confidence in his idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Moley

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home. Everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten, except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues. The only thing that ends it is the news that the kitten has a new home.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Fed up with Toms cat hair, Rick buys the "Suck-Up," a next level Roomba-like cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans nonstop. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming machine turns on them both and takes over the house -- Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The storm of the century is brewing -- according to Tuffy and Jerry, that is, who are giving Tom a little payback for tormenting them earlier. Spike also gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its picture day! Spike and Tom end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house and tells him he must get rid of it or hell be sleeping outside. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kite-surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the she-bear hes in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admirat

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play a new game, floating like flags in the breeze from the fan set on maximum. But Grizzy quickly rids the living room of this interference.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun tearing down their Kapla block buildings, which they rebuild just as fast. Grizzy finds that the she-bear hes in love with is impressed by the construction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on into two.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy dreams that hes a valiant knight who has just delivered his beloved. As he is about to take her in his arms, he is woken by the din of the Lemmings, who have chosen this particular day to blast music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. But first, hell have to stop the Lemmings fiesta.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick buys a drone that Tom and Jerry immediately put to use for their own high-jinks.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is put in charge of getting the manors dog into showdog shape, unfortunately Jerry will try to sabotage him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom accidentally visits a bizarre twin version of his house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry dreams of a life where he is the lord of the manor, and Tom is the servant.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is on the case in this radical music video as he sneaks and sleuths his way to stop Gothams villains with his speed and detective skills.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. It’s time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. programme.desc: Spike orders Tom and Jerry to watch Tyke while hes away, but instead Tom takes the opportunity to chase Jerry in the backyard. Suddenly, Tyke is nowhere to be seen and the front gate is wide open! Tom and Jerry must find the pup in time or face Spikes beating.

programme.desc: On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, Tom is carried off to Dr. Frankensteins castle lab. Several lightning bolts later, a monster comes to life: a nine-foot-tall hulk with Toms relatively tiny head sewn on. Frankenstein orders the monster to go terrorize the village, but it has problems focusing after Toms head sees Jerry in the lab.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry go to a pool party at Toodless place, Tom shows off in the pool with ridiculous stunts. Butch and Meathead arrive, adding more rivalry to the party. Soon, Toodles suggests they play a game of water polo, which reaches a fever pitch before long.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike the bulldog comes to Tom and Jerry, complaining he is being harassed by unknown creditors, ex-girlfriends, and other problems due to identity theft. They take the case on and go in search of who could be using Spikes name. It quickly becomes equally confusing for them to sort out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A fast-talking sales cat named Dr. Jake L. appears to Tom from a trap door in the floor, selling "Ache-Eee Bones" tonic. However, when the doctor sees Jerry and Tuffy, he instantly turns into the slobbering Mr. Hyde-Cat and chases them, but then changes back to the doctor. Tom wants to buy the tonic but soon finds out whats happening with the visiting cat and tries to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Butch breaks up with his girlfriend, Tom, Jerry, and Tuffy work to bring them back together so Butch wont go after Toodles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop- a spray that creates a tiny cop that chases Jerry around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Hoots Talon to expand and paint the old library. / The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the Mouse Sisters to build a bridge over a mac and cheese spill. / The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a science museum in the desert where Wile E. Coyote becomes distracted by the Road Runner.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a mythical creature named “Big Feet.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, but the bot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball," but the Kitty "Kitty" is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny are stargazing when some pesky fireflies buzz over and cause chaos!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: If Mush-Mush had Bolly’s speed, he’d want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was. But Bolly is different – he just likes to use his speed helping Mushables. So when Mush-Mush organizes a big stunt for Bolly, he refuses. He just doesn’t like to show off. But Mush-Mush promised everyone a show so a show he will give them – with Mush-Mush performing instead of Bolly! Gulp!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep becomes obsessed with learning all about Mushlore -- all the funny little traditions and things that Mushables believe in.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Chep’s disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning. But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he won’t let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away.
