Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day! But when the Food Snail falls for, and takes off after, the Travel Snail, Pancake Day has to be cancelled. Chep sees an opportunity to save the day for his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: MMs favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere - nature must run its course. But Lilit feels so sorry for the frog she takes it back to Mushton where it causes havoc. Now our friends must lure the frog back to its home where it deals with the lizard itself.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Its Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. But our Mushlers spill Chanterelles paint by accident, and now they must replace it by finding a rare Sloof beetle they have never heard of….

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miffs tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide its time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out. Our friends ask Mushpot to step up from being their coach to racing with them. The Mushelder is reluctant at first but soon reveals the tough competitor he is!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who isan Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become inventive himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes ‘man overboard’ and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesn’t have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises it’s a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesn’t go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whos afraid of silent movies about killer cats, alien blobs, and little men dancing in sugar bowls? Mr Bean. He is very scared. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination running wild.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket’s pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbour’s house via the park. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who isan Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become inventive himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. Mutta Finias ja Ferb korjaavat puhelimen ja lisaavat siihen runsaasti uusia toimintoja. Candace on tyytyvainen – kunnes puhelin telesiirtaa hanet Paasiaissaarille! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa Noutonaattorin. / Isa katselee lapsuutensa lempisarjaa, mutta television taikamattoajelu ei veda vertoja ajan kultaamille muistoille. Siispa Finias ja Ferb paattavat tehda hanelle oikean lentavan maton. Silla valin Candace yrittaa ennustaa tulevaisuutta onnenkeksien avulla ja tohtori Tollontyo on varastanut hankalasti puhdistettavia aineita Tahranaattoriaan varten.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace pilaa kampauksensa juuri ennen Jeremyn aidin jarjestamaa hyvantekevaisyysgaalaa, han joutuu turvautumaan Finiaksen ja Ferbin apuun. Han ei kuitenkaan noudata poikien ohjeita ja on pian kokonaan karvan peitossa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo on rakentanut Tosi-Pahanaattorin ja odottaa innolla, etta paasee nakemaan, mita se tekee. / On Danvillen vuosittaisten lihamurekefestivaalien aika ja aiti paasee toimimaan mureketuomarina. Kun Buford rikkoo festivaalien pomppulinnan, Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaislinnan sen tilalle. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo, joka on paattanyt voittaa murekekilpailun, kayttaa Madattajanaattoria pilatakseen muiden kilpailijoiden murekkeet.

programme.title: Tiku ja Taku
programme.desc: Tiku ja Taku ihailevat kovasti poliiseja. Siksi he seuraavat ystavaansa Platoa, joka on bulldoggi, ja hanen isantaansa etsiva Donald Drakea, joka jahtaa Percya taman varastettua Klutchcoinin rubiinin. He loytavat rubiinin, mutta Percy paasee pakoon. Poliisin paamajassa Drake paljastaa ryoston muistuttavan Klordanen tapauksia, mutta Klordane oli hukkunut jokeen vuotta aiemmin. Toisaalla Klordane (joka on varsin elossa) lahettaa Kollo-kissansa poliisiasemalle varastamaan rubiinin ja viemaan todisteet (pelimerkkeja ja lentolipun) Draken takintaskuun. Poliisit jarkyttyvat loydosta ja laittavat Draken ja Platon telkien taakse.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa – mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: On vuoden pisin paiva, ja Finias ja Ferb ottavat siita kaiken irti ja matkustavat maailman ympari yhdessa paivassa. Samana aikaan aiti ja isa lahtevat viikonloppumatkalle ja jattavat Candacen vastaamaan kodista. Han miettii, karayttaisiko veljensa vai lahtisiko heidan mukaansa Pariisiin tapaamaan Jeremya. Karaytys vai Jeremy? Han paattaa lahtea poikien mukaan todistaakseen, etta Jeremy yha pitaa hanesta. Matkan varrella Finiasin ikuinen optimismi joutuu koetukselle ja hanen on voitettava epailyksensa paastakseen kotiin ennen auringonlaskua.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Gepardin vauhti inspiroi Finiasia ja Ferbia valmistamaan huippunopeat kengat. Candacea eivat poikien puuhat kiinnosta, silla han valmistautuu Jeremyn perheen retkipaivaan. Pian han huomaa luvanneensa liikoja yhdelle paivalle ja astuu viallisiin prototyyppikenkiin ehtiakseen ajoissa kaikkialle. Tollontyolla on rahahuolia, ja han murehtii, joutuuko hanen talonsa myyntiin. / Finias ja Ferb ovat isovanhempien luona kylassa yhdessa ystaviensa kanssa. Lasten kisaillessa kuumailmapalloillaan Candace paattaa ottaa rennosti ja luopuu tavoitteestaan nalkittaa pojat. Myohemmin han oppii olemaan sisukkaampi. Tohtori Tollontyo rakentaa dronttinaattorin ja uhkaa paastaa valloilleen pelottavan dronttilintuarmeijansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas ja Ferb asuvat Luke Skywalkeria lahella olevilla kasteviljelmilla Tatooinen planeetalla, kun R2-D2 ja Kuolemantahden suunnitelmat putoavat vahingossa heidan kiituriinsa. Galaksin kohtalo on heidan harteillaan, joten he palkkaavat Han Solon kilpailijan, Isabellan, jotta saavat suunnitelmat palautettua kapinallisille. Matkaan tulee mutka, kun matala-arvoinen iskujoukkojen sotilas, Candace, paattaa yrittaa estaa kapinallisten toimet ja paatyy jahtaamaan heita ympari galaksin saadakseen Kuolemantahden suunnitelmat takaisin. Samaan aikaan Kuolemantahdella kehittyy intergalaktisen tason kaaosta. Perry the Rebelpus yrittaa estaa Darthenshmirtzia kayttamasta uutta Sith-inator-asetta, mutta hanet jaadytetaan karboniittiin. Soppa pahenee, kun Ferb saa iskun Sith-inatorista, joka muuttaa hanet Sithiksi, ja hanen on taisteltava veljiaan vastaan.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: „Armand Duplantis - sundinud lendama“ raagib loo Armand „Mondo“ Duplantisest ja sellest, kuidas imelapsest noorsportlasest sai kõigi aegade parim teivashuppaja. 21 aasta vanuselt oli Mondo purustanud maailmarekordi ja tulnud olumpiavõitjaks, taites sellega oma ala armastava lapse ammuse unistuse. Film on samas ka taiskasvanuks saamise lugu, kus uhe noormehe vankumatu soov paremaks saada satub vastuollu tema oskustega uues maailmas toime tulla.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Parast tulistamisjuhtumit teeb terve ruhm koostood. Steviel on kokkupõrge kurjategijatega, Mo kuuleb tõtt oma isa kohta.

programme.title: World Athletics Championships 2025
programme.desc: 9. võistluspaev. 10-võistlus, 110 m tõkkejooks (Johannes Erm, Janek Õiglane, Karel Tilga). 10-võistluse kettaheide. 10-võistluse kettaheide ja teivashupe. Kommenteerivad Helar Osila ja Juhan Kilumets.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: "Maahommik" toob ekraanile arksad ideed, tegusad inimesed ja huvitavad ettevõtmised.

programme.title: Lahutus Eesti moodi
programme.desc: Aksel ja Laura on kriisi seljatanud, aga juba triivivad uued pilved abieluplaani kohal, kui Laura avastab, et Akslil on salajane kohting noore naisrežissooriga. Samal ajal tuleb Mirjam tagasi ja otsustab Taunole uue võimaluse anda. Teraapiaulesanne keskendub aga varvikale eelmangule, mis ootamatult Aksli toosuhted ohtu seab. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissoor Ergo Kuld, tootja Kassikuld OÜ.

programme.title: Ühe pere muusika
programme.desc: Naitlejate Laura ja Priit Võigemasti jaoks on muusika elu lahutamatu osa. Nad on laulvad ja lavastavad naitlejad, kellel laval põimuvad kaks maailma – sõna ja laul. Kui rohelised on niidud ja kui siniseks võib tõusta taevas, kui need kaks annet kokku saavad? Vastuse leiab Reet Kiidjarvel, kus etendub muusikal „Rohelised niidud” ning Laura ja Priit astuvad publiku ette mitmes rollis.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: OP lood
programme.desc: Margit Kilumets kulastab muusik Siiri Sisaskit tema kodutalus Raplamaal. Intervjuu on salvestatud hilissuvel 2020. Tana on Siiri Sisaskil 57. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: World Athletics Championships 2025
programme.desc: 9. võistluspaev. 10-võistluse odavise. 10-võistlus (Johannes Erm, Janek Õiglane, Karel Tilga), naiste kõrgushuppe finaal, naiste 800 m jooksu finaal, meeste 5000 m jooksu finaal, meeste kettaheite finaal, teatejooksude finaalid. Kommenteerivad Helar Osila ja Juhan Kilumets.

programme.title: Signora Volpe
programme.desc: Seekord saab Sylvia katte uks ta vanu vaenlasi, kes ta roovib ja keldrisse lukustab. Kogu pere uhineb, et Sylviat paasta, ja Sylvia ise jookseb ajaga võidu, et enda roovija ule kavaldada ja eluga paaseda.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: IT-vaatlik
programme.desc: Kubermaailma võlusid kasutades võime sattuda erinevate pahatahtlike kavatsuste ohvriks. Kuidas parandada kuberturvalisust, margata ohumarke ja ennetada võimalikku kahju? Praktilist nõu, kuidas internetis turvaliselt toimetada, petukirju ara tunda, sotsiaalmeedias mõistlikult kaituda ja palju muud, jagavad oma ala spetsialistid.

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Tehisintellekti jõud peitub keelemudelites. Kas oleme tehnoloogiaga dialoogi pidamiseks valmis ja kuidas saame tagada eesti keele elujõulisuse muutuvas maailmas? Tehisaru mõju on tunda igal elualal ja see, et saaksime kõikjal kasutada oma emakeelt, on alus selle sailimisele. „TeadusEST“ raagib nendega, kes katt pidevalt nii tehisintellekti kui ka eesti keele pulsil hoiavad ja nende seose tulevikku mõista aitavad. Saatejuht-toimetaja Kristjan Pihl, toimetaja Kertu Loide, režissoor Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Anatoli Tafitšuk, tootja Ulm Production. Saade valmib koostoos Eesti Teadusagentuuriga

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: President Trumpi sõnul on ta valmis Moskva vastu kehtestama karmid sanktsioonid, aga selle eelduseks on Vene nafta ostmise lõpetamine kõikide NATO riikide poolt. Kui realistlik selline nõudmine uldse on ja millisesse seisu on Ukraina edukad runnakud naftataristu pihta pannud Venemaa majanduse, seda selgitab majandusekspert Raivo Vare. Ukraina uksused on Pokrovski piirkonnas venelaste kõige ohtlikumad labimurdekatsed suutnud tõrjuda, aga uldine olukord Donbassis ei ole siiski paranenud. Kui ukrainlased saavadki kuskil vaenlase runnaku pidama, siis leiavad need kiirelt uue nõrga koha ja aeglane edasitung uldplaanis ikka jatkub. Rindeseisu analuusib kolonelleitnant reservis Leo Kunnas. Saatejuht on Joosep Vark. Toimetaja Peep Kala, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Selgeltnagija ennustab ebaharilikke sundmusi. Uurijaruhm hakkab teda kahtlustama. Humphrey ja Martha astuvad suure sammu kasuvanemateks saamise poole.

programme.title: Puudutus
programme.desc: 1944. aasta sugisel peavad tuhanded eestlased jatma oma kodu ja põgenema ule mere tundmatusse. Nuud, 80 aastat hiljem, avatakse Parnus sellele traagilisele sundmusele puhendatud malestusmark. Varskes dokumentaalfilmis saavad sõna skulptor Elo Liiv ja eestlased nii lahedalt kui ka kaugelt. Režissoor Marko Piirsoo, produtsent Kaidor Kahar, tootja Suur Pilt OÜ.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Aasta aega ametipostil olnud meeskond peab pistma rinda narkokuritegude lainega, mis tekitab kokkupuuteid lojalistidega. Vagivaldse kokkupõrke tõttu on Stevie ja Gracei toosuhe ohus.

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Masinakirjutaja kutsutakse kindlaks kellaajaks teatud aadressile. Perenaist pole kusagil, maja on tais kellasid, mis naitavad vale aega, ja tagatipuks lamab diivani taga tundmatu surnukeha. Juhuslikult sinna kanti sattunud leitnant palub Poirot appi, kuna on veendunud tutarlapse suutuses.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Nullpunkt
programme.desc: Katkisest perest parit Johannesel õnnestub Tallinna eliitkooli sisse saada. Uues koolis võtavad klassikaaslased ta esialgu sõbralikult vastu, ent Eesti on vaike ja poisi kohta liiguvad jutud, mis hea esmamulje kiiresti rikuvad. Tasapisi hakkavad kodus Johannese ja ema vahel kasvama uued pinged, koolis surutakse ta jõuliselt heidiku staatusesse ning vanad sõbrad Lasnamaelt ei tee elu lihtsamaks. Johannes satub tupikusse, kuid leiab toimetulekuks uue strateegia - elu paremaks muutmist tuleb alustada iseendast. Tootja Allfilm OÜ.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: OP
programme.desc: Iganadalane kultuurikompass! Saatejuht Owe Petersell võtab vaataja kaasa kinno, teatrisse, naitusele, raamatupoodi, kontserdile ja mujalegi. Režissoor Antti Hakli, toimetajad Ave-Marleen Rei ja Ave Lutter.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: "Maahommik" toob ekraanile arksad ideed, tegusad inimesed ja huvitavad ettevõtmised.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Margarita ei taha Tadeo abist kuuldagi. Simona raagib Lopele Antoñito kirja kohta tõtt. Pelayo teeb Catalinale kalli kingituse. La Promesas toimub maskiball.

programme.title: Solsidan
programme.desc: Alexi ja Anna pojal Lovel on tugev kliimaarevus. Mickan ja Fredde saavad teada tõe Victori hinnete ning tulevikuplaanide kohta. Anna isa Rune satub haiglasse, talle on seltsiks Ove ja Anette.

programme.title: Eesti nuud siis Vabariik
programme.desc: Kukekese baar saab uue ja erutava masina, mis võtab Illaril kaed varisema. Ats puuab Marjut toetada. Kõik kardavad Helle Vokki, kuid Helle loodab hoopis silmailu saada. Poolikust pildist saab elu ja surma kusimus.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy
programme.desc: Stanley Tucci suundub Rooma kuulsat nelja pastat otsima. Muuhulgas kulastab ta kohalikku kulinaariapoodi, maitseb veisesudametartari ja õpib artišokke õigesti frittima.

programme.title: IT-vaatlik
programme.desc: Kubermaailma võlusid kasutades võime sattuda erinevate pahatahtlike kavatsuste ohvriks. Kuidas parandada kuberturvalisust, margata ohumarke ja ennetada võimalikku kahju? Praktilist nõu, kuidas internetis turvaliselt toimetada, petukirju ara tunda, sotsiaalmeedias mõistlikult kaituda ja palju muud, jagavad oma ala spetsialistid.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Celia Hansonil, maale kolinud vanal õpetajal, tekib tuli farmerist naabriga. Blaketoni sekkumine ajab asja kriminaalseks.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Pille isa ja Evald kohtuvad raamatukaupluses. Kohvikus raagitakse sirgeks nii mõnedki asjad. Põder naitab Margnale hotelli ja koos tehakse liigud. Ka Pille raagib isale Evaldist. Jaanus saab sõjavaekutse. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama. Idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Solsidan
programme.desc: Fredde hakkab muretsema oma vanuse parast ja kaib iluoperatsioonil. Alexil on dilemma: tutar Wilma ei taha mangida uue sõbra Milliega, aga Alex suhtleks hea meelega Millie isaga. Mickan saab rolli etenduses, kus Anna parajasti proove teeb.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: María naudib kostuumipidu taiest hingest. Majas liiguvad jutud Manueli kaitumisest. Jimena teeb markiisile etteheiteid. Catalina tunnistab, et on armunud.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Harkivis, mis kannatab venelaste terrori all, oli Putinil varem suur toetajaskond venekeelsete elanike hulgas. Enam mitte. Kas Anastassia ja Grigori mõistavad neid?

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Tallinna Tehnikaulikooli teadlaste kutsel kais sel suvel Eestis tunnustatud Briti loodusfotograaf ja allveefilmija Jack Perks, kes on hindamatu spetsialist kalade filmimise alal. Kohtume Perksiga Pirita jõel, kus ta Eesti teadusruhma nõustab. Eesti on hiljuti saanud rikkamaks uhe orhideeliigi võrra. Meil on eriline võimalus naha seda salajases paigas kasvavat kapalist nimega sale tanukeel, mis on võetud range kaitse alla. Kaido Haageni luhilugu viib meid inimese poolt asustamata Kuningakulla, kus kaib siiski vilgas elu. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Valisilm
programme.desc: Valispoliitilisi sundmusi ja Eesti valispoliitikat kommenteerivad ning analuusivad "Aktuaalse kaamera" valistoimetuse ajakirjanikud. Saatejuht Maria-Ann Rohemae.

programme.title: Russia’s Shadow War in Africa
programme.desc: Parast sõjavaelisi riigipoordeid Nigeris, Malis ja Burkina Fasos tõrjusid uued juhid Laane vaed maalt valja. Venemaa tahab taita Aafrikas tekkinud võimuvaakumit, et edendada oma geopoliitilist agendat. Kunagisest kultuuri- ja kaubanduskeskusest Sahelist on saanud võõrvõimude mangukann, terrori ja repressioonide maa, kus ajakirjanike elu on ohus. Dokumentaalfilm uurib, kui kaugele ulatub Putini mõjuvõim Aafrika kontinendil.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: Selgeltnagija ennustab ebaharilikke sundmusi. Uurijaruhm hakkab teda kahtlustama. Humphrey ja Martha astuvad suure sammu kasuvanemateks saamise poole.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Celia Hansonil, maale kolinud vanal õpetajal, tekib tuli farmerist naabriga. Blaketoni sekkumine ajab asja kriminaalseks.

programme.title: Eesti nuud siis Vabariik
programme.desc: Kukekese baar saab uue ja erutava masina, mis võtab Illaril kaed varisema. Ats puuab Marjut toetada. Kõik kardavad Helle Vokki, kuid Helle loodab hoopis silmailu saada. Poolikust pildist saab elu ja surma kusimus.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 1980. aasta oli uks vaga põnev aeg. Tallinnas korraldati olumpiamangude raames rahvusvaheline purjeregatt ning valismaist ja uut tulvas uksest ning akendest. Sama aasta martsikuus nagi ilmavalgust 3. osa meelelahutussarjast "Miks ka mitte?", kus esines kullakarvaline, toonases ilmapildis uudsena mõjuv ja juba populaarsust koguv trio. Saatejuht Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.desc: Vastaanotolle saapuu jalkansa katkaissut koira ja seitseman akaista kanaa. Rakennustyomaalta loytynyt tajuton kissanpoikanen yhdistaa koko tiimin.

programme.title: Unelmahaat
programme.desc: Noora Laaksonen, 31, ja Sakari Laaksonen, 36, siunataan avioliittoon Raision kirkossa. Pari tapasi Tinderin valityksella kesalla 2020. Tarkat maareet unelmamiehelleen asettanut Noora sai Sakarin kuvan nahdessaan hieraista silmiaan, silla tama vastasi Nooran korkeita laatukriteereita. Kaynnistyi tiivis tapailu, ja suhde alkoi syventya. Sakarin antamat signaalit olivat kuitenkin ristiriitaisia, silla han vaikutti samaan aikaan seka etaiselta ja kiinnostuneelta. Nooran karsivallisyys oli jo katkeamassa, kun viimein selvisi, etta Sakari oli esittanyt vaikeasti tavoiteltavaa vain siksi, ettei han menettaisi uutta ihastustaan liiallisen intonsa vuoksi. Haajarjestelyt sujuvat maaratietoisen morsiamen ohjaksissa, ja sulhasen tehtavaksi jaa toteuttaa visioita parhaansa mukaan.

programme.title: After the Sunset - keikka Bahamalla
programme.desc: Mestarivaras Max Burdett vetaytyy viimeisen ryoston jalkeen paratiisisaarelle kauniin kumppaninsa kanssa nauttimaan kovan tyon tuloksista. Hanen elinikainen vastustajansa, viekas FBI-agentti Stan, rantautuu saarelle varmistamaan, etta varas pitaa lupauksensa. Tarjolla on Napoleonin viimeinen timantti - kayko kiusaus liian suureksi Maxille, ja saako Stan hanet lopultakin nalkkiin? 97 min. Ohjaus: Brett Ratner. Paaosissa: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek ja Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: After the Sunset - keikka Bahamalla
programme.desc: Mestarivaras Max Burdett vetaytyy viimeisen ryoston jalkeen paratiisisaarelle kauniin kumppaninsa kanssa nauttimaan kovan tyon tuloksista. Hanen elinikainen vastustajansa, viekas FBI-agentti Stan, rantautuu saarelle varmistamaan, etta varas pitaa lupauksensa. Tarjolla on Napoleonin viimeinen timantti - kayko kiusaus liian suureksi Maxille, ja saako Stan hanet lopultakin nalkkiin? 97 min. Ohjaus: Brett Ratner. Paaosissa: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek ja Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Unelmakoti 100 paivassa
programme.desc: Aviopari Brian ja Mika Kleinschmidt tekevat ihmisten asuntounelmista totta. Parivaljakko auttaa suunnittelussa ja rakentamisessa, mutta kiire on kova: unelmakorin on oltava valmis vain 100 paivassa.
